# Keyword Research: White-Label Dating Platform

## Executive Summary

This document outlines the comprehensive keyword strategy for our AI-powered white-label dating platform SaaS. Target audience includes entrepreneurs, agencies, and businesses looking to launch dating apps without development overhead.

---

## Primary Keywords

| Keyword | Monthly Search Volume | Competition | CPC Estimate | Priority |
|---------|----------------------|-------------|--------------|----------|
| white label dating app | 1,900 | Medium | $8.50 | High |
| dating app white label | 1,600 | Medium | $7.80 | High |
| dating platform SaaS | 880 | Low | $12.40 | High |
| white label dating software | 720 | Medium | $9.20 | High |
| dating app builder | 2,400 | High | $6.50 | High |
| create dating app | 3,600 | High | $5.80 | Medium |
| dating app development | 4,400 | High | $15.60 | Medium |
| white label matchmaking platform | 390 | Low | $11.00 | High |
| dating website template | 1,300 | Medium | $4.20 | Medium |
| dating app clone | 2,100 | Medium | $7.40 | Medium |

---

## Long-Tail Keywords

### Business/Entrepreneur Focused

| Keyword | Monthly Search Volume | Competition | Intent |
|---------|----------------------|-------------|--------|
| how to start a dating app business | 880 | Medium | Informational |
| white label dating app for entrepreneurs | 210 | Low | Commercial |
| start dating website without coding | 320 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app business startup cost | 590 | Medium | Informational |
| launch dating app in 30 days | 140 | Low | Commercial |
| dating platform with AI matching | 260 | Low | Commercial |
| affordable dating app development | 480 | Medium | Commercial |
| dating app SaaS under $3000 | 90 | Low | Transactional |
| best white label dating solution 2024 | 170 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app for niche markets | 390 | Low | Informational |

### Feature-Specific Keywords

| Keyword | Monthly Search Volume | Competition | Intent |
|---------|----------------------|-------------|--------|
| AI-powered dating app | 1,100 | Medium | Informational |
| dating app with video chat | 720 | Medium | Commercial |
| dating platform with verification | 340 | Low | Commercial |
| swipe dating app builder | 260 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app with geolocation | 190 | Low | Commercial |
| customizable dating platform | 210 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app admin dashboard | 140 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app monetization features | 170 | Low | Informational |
| dating platform with analytics | 90 | Low | Commercial |
| multi-language dating app | 150 | Low | Commercial |

### Niche Market Keywords

| Keyword | Monthly Search Volume | Competition | Intent |
|---------|----------------------|-------------|--------|
| christian dating app white label | 110 | Low | Commercial |
| professional dating platform builder | 140 | Low | Commercial |
| senior dating app development | 260 | Low | Commercial |
| LGBTQ dating app builder | 190 | Low | Commercial |
| fitness dating app white label | 90 | Low | Commercial |
| religious dating platform SaaS | 70 | Low | Commercial |
| luxury dating app development | 170 | Low | Commercial |
| ethnic dating app builder | 120 | Low | Commercial |
| farmer dating app white label | 80 | Low | Commercial |
| pet lover dating platform | 140 | Low | Commercial |

### Comparison Keywords

| Keyword | Monthly Search Volume | Competition | Intent |
|---------|----------------------|-------------|--------|
| tinder clone script | 1,900 | High | Commercial |
| bumble alternative white label | 260 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app like hinge | 590 | Medium | Commercial |
| better than dating pro software | 90 | Low | Commercial |
| SkaDate alternative | 320 | Low | Commercial |
| dating app builder vs custom development | 110 | Low | Informational |
| white label vs custom dating app | 140 | Low | Informational |

---

## Semantic Keywords & LSI Terms

### Core Semantic Terms
- Matchmaking software
- Online dating solution
- Dating website builder
- Relationship app platform
- Social dating network
- Dating marketplace
- Connection platform
- Partner matching system

### Technical Terms
- PWA dating app
- Native dating application
- Cross-platform dating solution
- Responsive dating website
- Mobile-first dating platform
- API-driven dating system
- Cloud-hosted dating platform
- Scalable dating infrastructure

### Business Terms
- Dating app revenue model
- Subscription dating platform
- Freemium dating app
- Dating app monetization
- Dating business in a box
- Turnkey dating solution
- Ready-made dating app
- Pre-built dating platform

---

## Keyword Clusters

### Cluster 1: Product Discovery
**Primary:** white label dating app
- white label dating platform
- dating app white label solution
- branded dating application
- custom dating app builder

### Cluster 2: Business Opportunity
**Primary:** dating app business
- start dating app company
- dating app startup
- dating business opportunity
- dating app entrepreneurship

### Cluster 3: Technical Features
**Primary:** AI dating app
- machine learning matchmaking
- smart matching algorithm
- AI-powered compatibility
- intelligent dating recommendations

### Cluster 4: Cost/Value
**Primary:** affordable dating app development
- low cost dating platform
- budget dating app builder
- dating app pricing
- dating platform investment

### Cluster 5: Speed to Market
**Primary:** launch dating app quickly
- fast dating app deployment
- instant dating platform
- quick dating app setup
- rapid dating app launch

---

## Negative Keywords (For Paid Campaigns)

Exclude these terms to avoid wasted ad spend:

- free dating app download
- tinder login
- bumble sign up
- dating sites for seniors free
- best free dating apps
- dating app reviews
- is [dating app] safe
- dating app scams
- how to delete dating app
- dating app not working

---

## Geographic Targeting Keywords

### United States
- dating app builder USA
- white label dating platform US
- American dating app development

### United Kingdom
- dating platform UK
- white label dating app Britain
- UK dating software

### Canada
- Canadian dating app builder
- dating platform Canada
- white label dating software CA

### Australia
- Australian dating app development
- dating platform Australia
- white label dating app AU

---

## Seasonal Keyword Opportunities

### Q1 (January - March)
- new year dating app launch
- valentine's day dating platform
- spring dating app business

### Q2 (April - June)
- summer dating app
- wedding season dating platform
- outdoor dating app features

### Q3 (July - September)
- back to dating app
- cuffing season preparation
- fall dating platform launch

### Q4 (October - December)
- holiday dating app
- new year dating business
- winter dating platform

---

## Content Topic Ideas Based on Keywords

### Blog Post Topics
1. "How to Launch a Dating App in 30 Days for Under $3,000"
2. "White Label vs Custom Dating App Development: Complete Comparison"
3. "10 Profitable Niche Dating App Ideas for 2024"
4. "AI in Dating Apps: How Smart Matching Increases User Retention"
5. "Dating App Monetization: 7 Revenue Streams Beyond Subscriptions"
6. "The True Cost of Building a Dating App from Scratch"
7. "Case Study: How [Client] Launched Their Dating App in 2 Weeks"
8. "Dating App Features That Drive User Engagement"
9. "Legal Requirements for Running a Dating Platform"
10. "Scaling Your Dating App: From 1,000 to 100,000 Users"

### Video Content Topics
1. Platform demo and walkthrough
2. Success story interviews
3. Feature highlight series
4. Industry trend analysis
5. Tutorial: Customizing your dating app

---

## Keyword Implementation Priority

### Phase 1 (Month 1-2) - Foundation
Focus on high-intent, lower competition keywords:
- white label dating software
- dating platform SaaS
- white label matchmaking platform
- customizable dating platform

### Phase 2 (Month 3-4) - Expansion
Target medium competition, higher volume keywords:
- white label dating app
- dating app builder
- dating app clone

### Phase 3 (Month 5-6) - Authority Building
Compete for high-volume, competitive keywords:
- create dating app
- dating app development
- tinder clone script

---

## Tracking & KPIs

### Organic Search Metrics
- Keyword ranking positions (target: top 10 for primary keywords)
- Organic traffic growth (target: 25% MoM)
- Click-through rate (target: >3%)
- Bounce rate (target: <50%)

### Conversion Metrics
- Demo requests from organic search
- Trial signups from organic search
- Keyword-to-conversion attribution

---

*Last Updated: January 2024*
*Review Schedule: Monthly*

- Apps & Software
- Self-improvement
- Side hustles
- Startups
- Digital Marketing

### Behavioral Targeting
- Past purchase of business products
- Engaged with entrepreneurship content
- App installers (business category)

### Lookalike Audiences
- Based on website visitors
- Based on demo bookers
- Based on customers

---

## Spark Ads Strategy

### Organic-to-Paid Approach
1. Post video scripts organically first
2. Monitor for 24-48 hours
3. Boost top performers as Spark Ads
4. Scale winners aggressively

### Creator Partnership Ideas
- Partner with entrepreneurship TikTokers
- App review/tech creators
- "Day in the life" business creators
- Financial advice creators

---

## Campaign Structure

### Campaign 1: Top of Funnel - Awareness
- **Objective:** Video Views
- **Budget:** $100-200/day
- **Content:** Hook-heavy, curiosity-driving videos
- **Goal:** Build pixel data, identify audiences

### Campaign 2: Middle of Funnel - Consideration
- **Objective:** Traffic
- **Budget:** $150-300/day
- **Content:** Feature demos, success stories
- **Audience:** Video viewers, website visitors
- **Goal:** Drive demo page visits

### Campaign 3: Bottom of Funnel - Conversion
- **Objective:** Conversions (Lead Gen)
- **Budget:** $200-500/day
- **Content:** Direct response, clear CTA
- **Audience:** High-intent website visitors, engaged users
- **Goal:** Demo bookings

---

## Performance Benchmarks

| Metric | Target | TikTok Average |
|--------|--------|----------------|
| CTR | >1.0% | 0.84% |
| Video View Rate | >15% | 12% |
| 6-Second View Rate | >50% | 40% |
| CPC | <$1.50 | $1.00 |
| CPM | <$10 | $6.06 |
| Cost per Lead | <$30 | Varies |

---

## Testing Calendar

### Week 1: Hook Testing
- Create 3-5 variations of each script with different hooks
- Run with small budget ($20-30/day each)
- Kill underperformers after 48 hours

### Week 2: Script Testing
- Test winning hooks with full script variations
- A/B test CTAs
- Identify top 2-3 creatives

### Week 3: Audience Testing
- Test different interest combinations
- Test age ranges
- Test lookalikes vs interests

### Week 4: Scale
- Increase budget on winners (20-30% daily max)
- Launch new creative variations of winners
- Begin Spark Ads with creators

---

## Creative Refresh Schedule

- **Weekly:** New hook variations
- **Bi-weekly:** New full script concepts
- **Monthly:** Major creative refresh
- **Ongoing:** Monitor trending sounds/formats

---

*Last Updated: January 2024*
*Review Schedule: Weekly creative performance, daily spend optimization*

## TikTok-Specific Best Practices

### Video Specs
- **Aspect Ratio:** 9:16 (vertical)
- **Resolution:** 1080x1920 minimum
- **Length:** 15-60 seconds (sweet spot: 21-34 seconds)
- **Format:** MP4 or MOV

### Audio Strategy
- Use trending sounds when possible
- Original audio for storytelling works well
- Background music should be upbeat, entrepreneurial
- Voiceover is essential - don't rely on text only

### Text Overlay Tips
- Keep text brief (3-5 words per overlay)
- Use bold, readable fonts
- Place text in safe zones (avoid top/bottom edges)
- Time text with spoken words for emphasis

### Hashtag Strategy
**Primary Hashtags:**
- #entrepreneur
- #sidehustle
- #startuplife
- #passiveincome
- #businesstiktok

**Secondary Hashtags:**
- #datingapp
- #techhustle
- #solopreneur
- #makemoneyonline
- #businessideas

**Trending Hashtags:**
- Check weekly for relevant trending tags
- Join relevant challenges when applicable

---

## Audience Targeting

### Demographics
- **Age:** 25-44 (primary), 18-24 (secondary)
- **Gender:** All
- **Location:** US, Canada, UK, Australia

### Interest Targeting
- Entrepreneurship
- Business & Finance
- Technology
- Apps & Software
- Self-improvement
- Side hustles
- Startups
- Digital Marketing

### Behavioral Targeting
- Past purchase of business products
- Engaged with entrepreneurship content
- App installers (business category)

### Lookalike Audiences
- Based on website visitors
- Based on demo bookers
- Based on customers

---

## Spark Ads Strategy

### Organic-to-Paid Approach
1. Post video scripts organically first
2. Monitor for 24-48 hours
3. Boost top performers as Spark Ads
4. Scale winners aggressively

### Creator Partnership Ideas
- Partner with entrepreneurship TikTokers
- App review/tech creators
- "Day in the life" business creators
- Financial advice creators

---

## Campaign Structure

### Campaign 1: Top of Funnel - Awareness
- **Objective:** Video Views
- **Budget:** $100-200/day
- **Content:** Hook-heavy, curiosity-driving videos
- **Goal:** Build pixel data, identify audiences

### Campaign 2: Middle of Funnel - Consideration
- **Objective:** Traffic
- **Budget:** $150-300/day
- **Content:** Feature demos, success stories
- **Audience:** Video viewers, website visitors
- **Goal:** Drive demo page visits

### Campaign 3: Bottom of Funnel - Conversion
- **Objective:** Conversions (Lead Gen)
- **Budget:** $200-500/day
- **Content:** Direct response, clear CTA
- **Audience:** High-intent website visitors, engaged users
- **Goal:** Demo bookings

---

## Performance Benchmarks

| Metric | Target | TikTok Average |
|--------|--------|----------------|
| CTR | >1.0% | 0.84% |
| Video View Rate | >15% | 12% |
| 6-Second View Rate | >50% | 40% |
| CPC | <$1.50 | $1.00 |
| CPM | <$10 | $6.06 |
| Cost per Lead | <$30 | Varies |

---

## Testing Calendar

### Week 1: Hook Testing
- Create 3-5 variations of each script with different hooks
- Run with small budget ($20-30/day each)
- Kill underperformers after 48 hours

### Week 2: Script Testing
- Test winning hooks with full script variations
- A/B test CTAs
- Identify top 2-3 creatives

### Week 3: Audience Testing
- Test different interest combinations
- Test age ranges
- Test lookalikes vs interests

### Week 4: Scale
- Increase budget on winners (20-30% daily max)
- Launch new creative variations of winners
- Begin Spark Ads with creators

---

## Creative Refresh Schedule

- **Weekly:** New hook variations
- **Bi-weekly:** New full script concepts
- **Monthly:** Major creative refresh
- **Ongoing:** Monitor trending sounds/formats

---

*Last Updated: January 2024*
*Review Schedule: Weekly creative performance, daily spend optimization*
